title: Ghost of Tsushima Movie Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.25.21
description:
Download the DoorDash app in the App Store and use code GAMES2021 or
GAMESCA (if you’re in Canada) to get 25% off and free delivery on your first order!

Go to http://gabi.com/gamesdaily to find out how much Gabi can save you!

GameSpot's Tamoor Hussain joins Tim for another TimTam KFGD! They talk all about PlayStation Studios, Xbox Live changes, Back 4 Blood's delay, and more!  

Follow Tamoor: https://twitter.com/TamoorH

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:04:55 - Microsoft Is Cutting The Xbox Live Gold Requirement For Party Chat And Free-To-Play Multiplayer
00:19:40 - Sony And PlayStation Productions Developing ‘Ghost of Tsushima’ Movie With ‘John Wick’s Chad Stahelski Directing
(Justin Kroll at Deadline)
00:31:35 - Back 4 Blood Delayed
00:43:00 -  Ad
00:43:50 - Housemarque’s Returnal Has Gone Gold
00:46:40 - Former Nintendo Of America President Reggie Fils-Aimé Leaving GameStop Board Of Directors (Ethan Gach at Kotaku)
00:48:55 - Has GameStop hit a new low and what realistic future does it have now? - Best Friends Q:Gondors Condor
00:53:10 - Out today
00:56:50 - Squad Up: BJ Bernardo
https://www.ign.com/articles/asian-american-game-developers-experience-minari
00:56:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Kah

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
